group_1.textRight: Well, I...
(Ayame...)
(There's no way she'll want to leave... @She just made a friend here.)
I think...it would be better for us to stay.
Hazuki!

group_1.textLeft: And what reason do you have for that?

group_1.textRight: If we just leave without clearing our@names...
Well, nothing good'll come of it.

group_1.textLeft: It won't matter when we leave Kamihama.

group_1.textRight: Are you sure?
The thing about rumors is they spread. @They could follow us wherever we go...
If more strange gossip were to start up@wherever we ended up...
Wouldn't we just have to leave there@too? It'd be never-ending, right?
We can't deny the possibility.
Isn't that the same logic you used with@Yachiyo?
Y-yeah, true, true! Uh-huh, uh-huh...!
Let's prove our innocence!
Or at the very least...stay a bit longer to@see how things turn out.

group_1.textLeft: You're right... I may have been getting@ahead of myself.

group_1.textRight: Konoha!
(Yeeeeees!)

group_1.textLeft: I'm not happy being falsely accused of these@things either.
I just don't want people to mess with us@anymore.

group_1.textRight: Believe me, I feel exactly the same.
So if things do get worse, we can leave@Kamihama then.
Are you okay with that, Ayame?
Yeah, yeah! I am!

group_1.textLeft: So what should we do?@What's the best way to clear our names?

group_1.textRight: Well, let me look into some things first.
I'll try and get more information out of@Nanaka, too.

group_1.textLeft: That's fine by me, but...don't get too@involved, okay?

group_1.textRight: ...click with anyone but us.@That's what you were gonna say, right?
Hey, Konoha...
(No, this isn't the right time to tell @her...)
Wait until I get a handle on what's going@on, okay?

group_1.narration: I managed to get her to stop thinking @about leaving Kamihama, at least for now.
But what do I do now...?
But I really think this is the best thing@for us.
